question: When did the first battle of Tarain fought between Muhammad Ghori and Prithviraj Chauhan?
explanation: Prithviraj Chauhan defeated Shahabuddin Muhammad Ghori in the First Battle of Tarain in 1191 AD. Prithviraj Chauhan, a Rajput king of the Chauhan dynasty, ruled the kingdoms of Ajmer and Delhi in northern India during the period of 1149â€“1192 AD.
